original_text: And there came two angels to Sodom at even; and Lot sat in the gate of Sodom: and Lot seeing them rose up to meet them; and he bowed himself with his face toward the ground;
korean_text: 저녁 때에 그 두 천사가 소돔에 이르니 마침 롯이 소돔 성문에 앉아 있다가 그들을 보고 일어나 영접하고 땅에 엎드려 절하며

sentences.original_text: And there came two angels to Sodom at even
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 저녁 때 두 천사가 소돔에 이르렀으며

sentences.original_text: and Lot sat in the gate of Sodom
and Lot seeing them rose up to meet them
and he bowed himself with his face toward the ground
